scripts.network: hc s clean && npm run build:happ && concurrently-repeat "npm run start:agent"
scripts.test: npm run build:happ && CARGO_TARGET_DIR=target/tests cargo t
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:dnas && hc app pack ./workdir
scripts.build:dnas: npm run build:zomes && hc dna pack ./workdir
scripts.start:agent: cross-env HC_PORT=$(port) concurrently -k "npm run playground" "npm run start:happ" "sleep 5 && npm run start -w @holochain-open-dev/calendar-events"
scripts.start:happ: RUST_LOG=warn hc s generate ./workdir/calendar_events.happ --run=$HC_PORT -a calendar_events network mdns
scripts.package: npm run build:happ && npm run package:ui && hc web-app pack workdir
scripts.package:ui: npm run build -w ui && cd ui/dist && bestzip ../dist.zip *
